title: Is standing up for National Anthem permissible in Islam? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so what about standing up for the national anthem it's totally prohibited you don't stand up except for allah nowadays whenever the muslim countries they play the national anthem actually the national anthem is haram it's music but everybody stands up and what are you doing what are you doing maybe next year you're going to do allah are you going to pray for the national anthem well sure everybody's doing it back in europe back in asia back in who cares these are kafirs so this shows you how deteriorating the level of commitment to islam you
